esac.archive.gacs.cl.tapclient

Class TapPlusConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • esac.archive.gacs.cl.tapclient.TapPlusConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TAPPlusInterface

    public class TapPlusConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements TAPPlusInterface
    Main class of this library. An object TapPlusConnection can be invoked to perform the main methods available at a TAP+ server like login, query, upload, etc It allows to hide from the user complexities like the use of sessions, https certificates, asynchronous queries, etc
    Author:
    jsalgado

      • uploadTable

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> uploadTable(java.lang.String tableName,

                                                    java.lang.String tableFile)
                                             throws java.security.KeyManagementException,
                                                    java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                    java.io.IOException
        Upload VOTable to the GACS user schema
        Parameters:
        tableName - Name to be assigned to this table in the user schema
        raCol - Column name where ra is located
        decCol - Column name where dec is located
        tableFile - Location of the file to be uploaded (e.g. /home//example.xml)
        Returns:
        Array list with the status report of the upload
        Throws:
        java.security.KeyManagementException
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.IOException
